Statute.Title: Translation Bureau Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Bureau de la traduction, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Public Works and Government Services (SI/93‑113 see also 1996, c. 16, s. 60(2))

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 1 (4th Supp.), s. 34 in force on assent 04.02.88
CIF, 1996, c. 16, ss. 57 to 59 in force 12.07.96 see SI/96‑67
